messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] anyone have teen unschoolers?
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Kathy, Welcome! On the unschooling.com message boards there are some folders that delve into unschooling in NY State quite deeply. I think there may also be
messages.messageBody:
Hi Kathy, Welcome!
On the unschooling.com message boards there are some folders that delve into
unschooling in NY State quite deeply. I think there may also be some NYers
here on the list. Here's a link to the NY boards:
http://www.unschooling.com/discus/messages/523/2385.html?WednesdayJanuary920
021229pm
~Elissa Cleaveland
"It is nothing short of a miracle that the modern methods of instruction
have
not yet entirely strangled the holy curiosity of inquiry." A. Einstein
